keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map a firstTab
map ; lastTab
map , previousTab
map w previousTab
map . nextTab
map e nextTab
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab
map zh scrollToLeft
map zl scrollToRight
map gh moveTabLeft
map gl moveTabRight
# for youtube
map gf LinkHints.activateMode
map gF LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
